price: ߓߌ߬ ߟߋ߬ ߞߕߌߕߍ߮ ߟߏ߲ ߘߌ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߕߎ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߡߊߛߐ߬ߛߐ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: هَٰذَا يَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: hādhā yawmu al-faṣli alladhī kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
